title: Prism Engineering
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: prism_engineering
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $60.9K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Prism Engineering. The average
  contract duration was 1.02 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $193.0K. The longest
  contract was 4.33 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.5M.
lookup_name: 'PRISM ENGINEERING'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '60.9K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '33'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '9%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '78%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '32.5K'
s424_mean_duration: '1.02'
s421_mean_contract_value: '193.0K'
s425_max_duration: '4.33'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.5M'
---
